name: UITextDropDelegate
desc: The interface for configuring a text viewâ€™s drop behavior.

items.name: func textDroppableView(UIView & UITextDroppable, proposalForDrop: UITextDropRequest) -> UITextDropProposal
items.desc: Asks the delegate if the text view can accept a drop operation.

items.name: func textDroppableView(UIView & UITextDroppable, willBecomeEditableForDrop: UITextDropRequest) -> UITextDropEditability
items.desc: Asks the delegate if a noneditable text view can accept a drop operation.

items.name: func textDroppableView(UIView & UITextDroppable, dropSessionDidEnter: UIDropSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user has moved the drag items into the coordinate system of the text view.

items.name: func textDroppableView(UIView & UITextDroppable, dropSessionDidExit: UIDropSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user has moved the drag items out of the text view's coordinate system.

items.name: func textDroppableView(UIView & UITextDroppable, dropSessionDidUpdate: UIDropSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the drop session has been updated.

items.name: func textDroppableView(UIView & UITextDroppable, dropSessionDidEnd: UIDropSession)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the drop session has ended.

items.name: func textDroppableView(UIView & UITextDroppable, willPerformDrop: UITextDropRequest)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the drop operation is about to happen.

items.name: func textDroppableView(UIView & UITextDroppable, previewForDroppingAllItemsWithDefault: UITargetedDragPreview) -> UITargetedDragPreview?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the preview to show during the drop animation.
